title: Drug injection fades as smoking grows more common, marking sea change in U.S. fentanyl epidemic
description: Experts view a shift from injecting fentanyl to smoking it as a promising development that could cut overdose deaths and reduce needle-related harms.
content: Experts view a shift from injecting fentanyl to smoking it as a promising development that could cut overdose deaths and reduce needle-related harms.
